mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Hotels
Architecture, American
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Hotel I (name and location unidentified), ca. 1893
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This photograph shows the front elevation of a "grand hotel"-type building. The name and location of the building are unknown (possibly in the American west or southwest) ca 1893. Image faded to yellowish tan with crescent-shaped yellow faded sections at lower left and right sides of photo
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: George Mason University Libraries Special Collections Research Center
